code: import React from"react";import"./SavedMovie.css";import star from"../../assets/star.png";import trash from"../../assets/trash.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SavedMovie=_ref=>{let{likedMovie,deleteMovie}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"likedMovie_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"likedMovie_image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500".concat(likedMovie.movie.poster_path),alt:"movie_poster"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"likedMovie_details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"title_and_icons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:likedMovie.movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"trash",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:trash,alt:"trash",onClick:()=>{deleteMovie(likedMovie);}})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"movie_date",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{className:"release_date",children:"Release Date:"})," ",likedMovie.movie.release_date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"likedMovie_subdetails",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"star",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:star,alt:"star"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"rating",children:Math.round(likedMovie.movie.vote_average*10)/10}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[likedMovie.movie.vote_count,"(votes)"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"movie_overview",children:likedMovie.movie.overview})]})]});};export default SavedMovie;
